title: pokevizSan2689
text: pokevizSan2689 small teaching package ETC5523. provides cleaned Pokémon dataset (pokemon) Shiny app explore base stats type generation.

title: pokevizSan2689
text: Launch Shiny app: Work bundled dataset:
code: library(pokevizSan2689) run_pokeviz() library(dplyr) library(ggplot2)  pokemon %>%   count(type1, sort = TRUE) %>%   head(10) pokemon %>%   filter(type1 %in% c("fire","water","grass")) %>%   ggplot(aes(attack, defense, colour = type1)) +   geom_point(alpha = 0.6) +   theme_minimal()

title: pokevizSan2689

title: Pokémon base stats dataset — pokemon
text: cleaned Pokémon dataset used Shiny app.

title: Pokémon base stats dataset — pokemon
text: tibble one row per Pokémon columns: name Pokémon name generation Game generation (integer) type1 Primary type type2 Secondary type (may NA) hp Base HP attack Base Attack defense Base Defense sp_attack Base Special Attack sp_defense Base Special Defense speed Base Speed

what: Launch the Pokémon Shiny app — run_pokeviz
